main event: A civilian observed a light in the sky for about 15 minutes in Somerset, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object appeared motionless for the entire observation time., The sighting was considered consistent with an astronomical observation, specifically Capella., The object was watched directly without any disappearance into the horizon., The exact coordinates and time of the observation were documented as 20 October 1966 at 2300 Hour 10 Minutes., The report noted that the conditions during the sighting included a clear sky with no photographs taken.
